transformations.name: DriftYellowTaxi
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

transformations.name: DriftGreenTaxi
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> YellowTaxi
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> GreenTaxi
YellowTaxi derive(taxi_type = toString(byName('taxi_type')),
		vendor_id = toInteger(byName('vendor_id')),
		pickup_datetime = toTimestamp(byName('pickup_datetime')),
		dropoff_datetime = toTimestamp(byName('dropoff_datetime')),
		store_and_fwd_flag = toString(byName('store_and_fwd_flag')),
		rate_code_id = toInteger(byName('rate_code_id')),
		pickup_location_id = toInteger(byName('pickup_location_id')),
		dropoff_location_id = toInteger(byName('dropoff_location_id')),
		pickup_longitude = toString(byName('pickup_longitude')),
		pickup_latitude = toString(byName('pickup_latitude')),
		dropoff_longitude = toString(byName('dropoff_longitude')),
		dropoff_latitude = toString(byName('dropoff_latitude')),
		passenger_count = toInteger(byName('passenger_count')),
		trip_distance = toDouble(byName('trip_distance')),
		fare_amount = toDouble(byName('fare_amount')),
		extra = toDouble(byName('extra')),
		mta_tax = toDouble(byName('mta_tax')),
		tip_amount = toDouble(byName('tip_amount')),
		tolls_amount = toDouble(byName('tolls_amount')),
		improvement_surcharge = toDouble(byName('improvement_surcharge')),
		total_amount = toDouble(byName('total_amount')),
		payment_type = toInteger(byName('payment_type')),
		vendor_abbreviation = toString(byName('vendor_abbreviation')),
		vendor_description = toString(byName('vendor_description')),
		month_name_short = toString(byName('month_name_short')),
		month_name_full = toString(byName('month_name_full')),
		payment_type_description = toString(byName('payment_type_description')),
		rate_code_description = toString(byName('rate_code_description')),
		pickup_borough = toString(byName('pickup_borough')),
		pickup_zone = toString(byName('pickup_zone')),
		pickup_service_zone = toString(byName('pickup_service_zone')),
		dropoff_borough = toString(byName('dropoff_borough')),
		dropoff_zone = toString(byName('dropoff_zone')),
		dropoff_service_zone = toString(byName('dropoff_service_zone')),
		pickup_year = toInteger(byName('pickup_year')),
		pickup_month = toInteger(byName('pickup_month')),
		pickup_day = toInteger(byName('pickup_day')),
		pickup_hour = toInteger(byName('pickup_hour')),
		pickup_minute = toInteger(byName('pickup_minute')),
		pickup_second = toInteger(byName('pickup_second')),
		pickup_date = toDate(byName('pickup_date')),
		dropoff_year = toInteger(byName('dropoff_year')),
		dropoff_month = toInteger(byName('dropoff_month')),
		dropoff_day = toInteger(byName('dropoff_day')),
		dropoff_hour = toInteger(byName('dropoff_hour')),
		dropoff_minute = toInteger(byName('dropoff_minute')),
		dropoff_second = toInteger(byName('dropoff_second')),
		dropoff_date = toDate(byName('dropoff_date')),
		dataset_file_nm = toString(byName('dataset_file_nm')),
		trip_year = toInteger(byName('trip_year')),
		trip_month = toInteger(byName('trip_month'))) ~> DriftYellowTaxi
GreenTaxi derive(taxi_type = toString(byName('taxi_type')),
		vendor_id = toInteger(byName('vendor_id')),
		pickup_datetime = toTimestamp(byName('pickup_datetime')),
		dropoff_datetime = toTimestamp(byName('dropoff_datetime')),
		store_and_fwd_flag = toString(byName('store_and_fwd_flag')),
		rate_code_id = toInteger(byName('rate_code_id')),
		pickup_location_id = toInteger(byName('pickup_location_id')),
		dropoff_location_id = toInteger(byName('dropoff_location_id')),
		pickup_longitude = toString(byName('pickup_longitude')),
		pickup_latitude = toString(byName('pickup_latitude')),
		dropoff_longitude = toString(byName('dropoff_longitude')),
		dropoff_latitude = toString(byName('dropoff_latitude')),
		passenger_count = toInteger(byName('passenger_count')),
		trip_distance = toDouble(byName('trip_distance')),
		fare_amount = toDouble(byName('fare_amount')),
		extra = toDouble(byName('extra')),
		mta_tax = toDouble(byName('mta_tax')),
		tip_amount = toDouble(byName('tip_amount')),
		tolls_amount = toDouble(byName('tolls_amount')),
		ehail_fee = toDouble(byName('ehail_fee')),
		improvement_surcharge = toDouble(byName('improvement_surcharge')),
		total_amount = toDouble(byName('total_amount')),
		payment_type = toInteger(byName('payment_type')),
		trip_type = toInteger(byName('trip_type')),
		vendor_abbreviation = toString(byName('vendor_abbreviation')),
		vendor_description = toString(byName('vendor_description')),
		trip_type_description = toString(byName('trip_type_description')),
		month_name_short = toString(byName('month_name_short')),
		month_name_full = toString(byName('month_name_full')),
		payment_type_description = toString(byName('payment_type_description')),
		rate_code_description = toString(byName('rate_code_description')),
		pickup_borough = toString(byName('pickup_borough')),
		pickup_zone = toString(byName('pickup_zone')),
		pickup_service_zone = toString(byName('pickup_service_zone')),
		dropoff_borough = toString(byName('dropoff_borough')),
		dropoff_zone = toString(byName('dropoff_zone')),
		dropoff_service_zone = toString(byName('dropoff_service_zone')),
		pickup_year = toInteger(byName('pickup_year')),
		pickup_month = toInteger(byName('pickup_month')),
		pickup_day = toInteger(byName('pickup_day')),
		pickup_hour = toInteger(byName('pickup_hour')),
		pickup_minute = toInteger(byName('pickup_minute')),
		pickup_second = toInteger(byName('pickup_second')),
		dropoff_year = toInteger(byName('dropoff_year')),
		dropoff_month = toInteger(byName('dropoff_month')),
		dropoff_day = toInteger(byName('dropoff_day')),
		dropoff_hour = toInteger(byName('dropoff_hour')),
		dropoff_minute = toInteger(byName('dropoff_minute')),
		dropoff_second = toInteger(byName('dropoff_second')),
		dataset_file_nm = toString(byName('dataset_file_nm')),
		trip_year = toInteger(byName('trip_year')),
		trip_month = toInteger(byName('trip_month'))) ~> DriftGreenTaxi
DriftGreenTaxi select(mapColumn(
		taxi_type,
		vendor_id,
		pickup_datetime,
		dropoff_datetime,
		store_and_fwd_flag,
		rate_code_id,
		pickup_location_id,
		dropoff_location_id,
		pickup_longitude,
		pickup_latitude,
		dropoff_longitude,
		dropoff_latitude,
		passenger_count,
		trip_distance,
		fare_amount,
		extra,
		mta_tax,
		tip_amount,
		tolls_amount,
		ehail_fee,
		improvement_surcharge,
		total_amount,
		payment_type,
		trip_type,
		vendor_abbreviation,
		vendor_description,
		trip_type_description,
		month_name_short,
		month_name_full,
		payment_type_description,
		rate_code_description,
		pickup_borough,
		pickup_zone,
		pickup_service_zone,
		dropoff_borough,
		dropoff_zone,
		dropoff_service_zone,
		pickup_year,
		pickup_month,
		pickup_day,
		pickup_hour,
		pickup_minute,
		pickup_second,
		dropoff_year,
		dropoff_month,
		dropoff_day,
		dropoff_hour,
		dropoff_minute,
		dropoff_second,
		trip_year,
		trip_month
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FinalColumnsGreen
DriftYellowTaxi derive(ehail_fee = toDouble('0.0'),
		trip_type = toInteger(0),
		trip_type_description = '') ~> DerivedColumnsYellowTaxi
DerivedColumnsYellowTaxi select(mapColumn(
		taxi_type,
		vendor_id,
		pickup_datetime,
		dropoff_datetime,
		store_and_fwd_flag,
		rate_code_id,
		pickup_location_id,
		dropoff_location_id,
		pickup_longitude,
		pickup_latitude,
		dropoff_longitude,
		dropoff_latitude,
		passenger_count,
		trip_distance,
		fare_amount,
		extra,
		mta_tax,
		tip_amount,
		tolls_amount,
		ehail_fee,
		improvement_surcharge,
		total_amount,
		payment_type,
		trip_type,
		vendor_abbreviation,
		vendor_description,
		trip_type_description,
		month_name_short,
		month_name_full,
		payment_type_description,
		rate_code_description,
		pickup_borough,
		pickup_zone,
		pickup_service_zone,
		dropoff_borough,
		dropoff_zone,
		dropoff_service_zone,
		pickup_year,
		pickup_month,
		pickup_day,
		pickup_hour,
		pickup_minute,
		pickup_second,
		dropoff_year,
		dropoff_month,
		dropoff_day,
		dropoff_hour,
		dropoff_minute,
		dropoff_second,
		trip_year,
		trip_month
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> FinalColumnsYellow
FinalColumnsYellow, FinalColumnsGreen union(byName: true)~> UnionYellowGreen
UnionYellowGreen sink(input(
		taxi_type as string,
		vendor_id as integer,
		pickup_datetime as timestamp,
		dropoff_datetime as timestamp,
		store_and_fwd_flag as string,
		rate_code_id as integer,
		pickup_location_id as integer,
		dropoff_location_id as integer,
		pickup_longitude as string,
		pickup_latitude as string,
		dropoff_longitude as string,
		dropoff_latitude as string,
		passenger_count as integer,
		trip_distance as double,
		fare_amount as double,
		extra as double,
		mta_tax as double,
		tip_amount as double,
		tolls_amount as double,
		ehail_fee as double,
		improvement_surcharge as double,
		total_amount as double,
		payment_type as integer,
		trip_type as integer,
		vendor_abbreviation as string,
		vendor_description as string,
		trip_type_description as string,
		month_name_short as string,
		month_name_full as string,
		payment_type_description as string,
		rate_code_description as string,
		pickup_borough as string,
		pickup_zone as string,
		pickup_service_zone as string,
		dropoff_borough as string,
		dropoff_zone as string,
		dropoff_service_zone as string,
		pickup_year as integer,
		pickup_month as integer,
		pickup_day as integer,
		pickup_hour as integer,
		pickup_minute as integer,
		pickup_second as integer,
		dropoff_year as integer,
		dropoff_month as integer,
		dropoff_day as integer,
		dropoff_hour as integer,
		dropoff_minute as integer,
		dropoff_second as integer,
		trip_year as string,
		trip_month as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionBy('key',
		0,
		taxi_type,
		trip_year,
		trip_month
	)) ~> SinkToConsumption
